name: com.karianakis.edit.tools
description: TERMINAL : add commands to execute in runtime like git bash  ,example add command shoot , you open terminal with space q and type shoot and enter and it will execute the shoot command that you added in code              ,    SHORTCUTS : add an action and a key combination to execute it in runtime , example add action shoot and assign it to space q and in runtime when you press space q it will execute the shoot action that you added in code           DYNAMIC DEBUG : create a text on screen in runtime and change its text to debug in runtime without using Debug.Log and searching in console
